name: 陳嘉勳
objective:
先修課程:4401011或負責教授同意
介紹結構體在受到張力、壓力、剪力、扭力及彎曲等外力狀態下之變形，分析應力，應變及變形，莫耳圓，壓力容器，樑，柱。
schedule:
1 Introduction
2 Concept or Stress
3 Concept or Stress
4Stress and Strain-Axial Loading 
5 Stress and Strain-Axial Loading
6 Stress and Strain-Axial Loading
7 Torsion (1)
8 Torsion (2)
9 Midterm Exam
10 Torsion (3)
11 Pure Bending (1)
12 Pure Bending (2)
13 Pure Bending (3)
14 Shearing Stresses in Beams and Thin-Walled Members
15 Shearing Stresses in Beams and Thin-Walled Members
16 Shearing Stresses in Beams and Thin-Walled Members
17 Review
18 Final Exam
materials:
使用課本：Mechanics of Materials 9th edition by Goodno and Gere
